example.eg: After a series of failures, he finally succeeded.
example.egtrans: 接连失败后，他终于成功了。

example.eg: The professor has published a series of books on various linguistic theories.
example.egtrans: 那位教授就多个语言学理论发表了一系列书籍。

example.eg: That new series on Channel 4 is very funny.
example.egtrans: 四频道新上映的系列节目很有趣。

example.eg: The murderer is not uncovered until the final episode of the series.
example.egtrans: 直到连续剧的最后一集，凶手才被发现。

dsense.name: series
dsense.guideword: UK (TV show: season of episodes) (电视剧)

example.eg: Patrick is looking forward to the new series of Doctor Who.
example.egtrans: 帕特里克期待着看《奇异博士》的新一季。

example.eg: England need to win this test in order to win the series.
She won the award for being the best actress in a dramatic series.
Four restaurants from the chain have been closed in a series.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一系列地, 一连串地
连续地, 串联地, 顺次地
